articles.title: First asteroid sightings push Hera’s camera to the limit - European Space Agency
articles.description: ESA’s Hera mission has captured images of asteroids (1126) Otero and (18805) Kellyday. Though distant and faint, the early observations serve as both a successful instrument test and a demonstration of agile spacecraft operations that could prove useful for p…
